title: Handle Driver App Technical Issue
description: A driver calls support because their app is frozen and they cannot complete their current trip.

tasks.description: Identify the driver's account and their currently active trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the driver's active trip record.

tasks.description: Guide the driver through basic troubleshooting steps (e.g., force quit and restart the app, restart their phone).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear technical support instructions.

tasks.description: If troubleshooting fails, manually complete the trip for the driver in the backend system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent ends the trip so the rider can exit and the driver can be paid.

tasks.description: File a technical issue ticket for the engineering team to investigate the app freeze.
tasks.expected_outcome: A bug report is created for the technical team.
